import { Location } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-expense', templateUrl: './create-expense.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-expense.component.css'], }) export class CreateExpenseComponent { formData = { expenseName: '', }; constructor(private location: Location) { } goBack() { this.location.back(); } submitForm(): void { console.log('Form data:', this.formData); // Add your form submission logic here } }
